article.content:
Request a Speaker or Interview

We welcome the opportunity to speak at events to inform U.S. companies, trade associations, and Hill staff about the Trade Agreements Compliance Program. Outreach activities increase awareness of the work we do to help resolve issues.

How to Request a Speaker

  1. Fill out and submit the Request Form. Please submit requests at least four weeks in advance.
  2. We will contact you within one week via e-mail. We make every effort to respond to requests within one week. If you have not received a response to your request within a week, please submit an additional form and indicate it is a follow up request.
  3. Finalize Date/Time/Location directly with assigned speaker. There is no charge for a speaker. However, the decision to travel distances greater than 50 miles is left o the discretion of the speaker and their supervisor.
  4. Confirm all speaker event details directly with the speaker one week prior to event.
  5. Please note that all speakers are volunteers. They volunteer as speakers in addition to their regular jobs and we will try our best to accommodate all requests.
